body.title: Welcome to
body.experiencia: 25+ Years of Experience Delivering More Than Packages
body.h1: GECOTEL, officially known as Postal and Telecommunications of Equatorial Guinea
body.parafo: It is the public company in charge of postal services in Equatorial Guinea. Founded in 1992, it is headquartered on Calle Rey Boncoro, Bioko Norte. The company has a staff of between 100 and 200 employees.
body.parafPagos: At GECOTEL, we guarantee flexible and secure payment options for our customers. We adapt our financial solutions to your needs, offering reliable methods to facilitate your shipments and business operations.
body.resumen1: Efficient mail delivery, ensuring that your letters arrive without any setbacks.
body.resumen2: We make sure that your shipments arrive intact and in the shortest time possible.
body.resumen3: We offer flexible payment options and reliable financial services.
body.resumen4: We guarantee timely deliveries to any destination in the world with complete confidence.
body.resumen5: We specialize in providing efficient, safe, and affordable logistical solutions for our clients. With advanced technology and a dedicated team, we ensure fast and smooth deliveries, adapting to the needs of each shipment.
body.footer9: Enter your tracking code to know the status and location of your shipment in real time. We guarantee accurate updates so you always know where your package is.
body.footer12: © GECOTEL. All rights reserved. Designed by Vemix
body.testimonio2: Excellent, fast, and reliable service. They improved our productivity by 40%.
body.testimonio4: Incredible customer service. They always resolve my questions efficiently.
body.testimonio5: Fast parcel service. Everything arrived in perfect condition.
body.testimonio6: Exceptional communication solution. Fast and seamless implementation.
body.testimonio8: Excellent, fast, and reliable service. They improved our productivity by 40%.
body.testimonio9: Incredible customer service. They always resolve my questions efficiently.
body.testimonio10: Fast parcel service. Everything arrived in perfect condition.
body.testimonio11: Exceptional communication solution. Fast and seamless implementation.

services.sectionDesc: As a leading company in postal and telecommunications, we offer comprehensive solutions for individuals and businesses.
services.service1: National and international distribution of correspondence and packages with different shipping methods.
services.service2: Management and operation of advanced telecommunications services to connect the country.
services.service3desc: Financial and savings services through our network of post offices nationwide.
services.service4desc: Fast and secure national and international money transfers.
services.service5desc: Creation of postage stamps and postage inscriptions with custom and commemorative designs.
services.service6desc: Distribution of stamps for collectors and special products for philately.
services.service7desc: Issuance and distribution of special coins for numismatic and commemorative purposes.
services.service8desc: Activities related to mail and telecommunications to meet specific needs.
services.service1modalDesc: GECOTEL manages basic postal services in Equatorial Guinea, ensuring the efficient and secure distribution of correspondence and packages both nationally and internationally.
services.service1feature1: Delivery of national and international correspondence
services.service1feature2: Parcel services with different shipping methods
services.service1feature5: Express parcel service for urgent deliveries
services.service1benefits: Our postal services offer reliable solutions for individuals and businesses, with nationwide coverage and international connections to more than 190 countries. We have the most modern infrastructure in Equatorial Guinea to guarantee the integrity and security of your shipments.
services.service2modalDesc: GECOTEL manages and operates the telecommunications services previously provided by the General Directorate of Post and Telecommunications, offering innovative solutions for the country's connectivity.
services.service2benefits: As the telecommunications regulator in Equatorial Guinea, we guarantee access to quality services that connect people and businesses, promoting the country's economic and social development through technology.
services.service3modalDesc: We manage and operate the Mail Postal Savings Bank service, offering accessible financial solutions through our extensive network of post offices.
services.service3feature2: Deposits and withdrawals at post offices
services.service3benefits: We bring financial services to remote areas where traditional banks don't operate, facilitating financial inclusion for the entire population. Our services are safe, reliable, and affordable.
services.service4modalDesc: We offer wire transfer services both ourselves and through the Postal Savings Bank, allowing for fast and secure money transfers nationally and internationally.
services.service4feature1: National money orders with immediate delivery
services.service4feature2: International transfers to more than 150 countries
services.service4feature3: Payment in cash or deposit into account
services.service4benefits: Our money transfer services allow you to send and receive money quickly and securely, with an extensive network of payment points throughout the country. Ideal for families receiving remittances and for businesses that need to make payments to suppliers.
services.service5modalDesc: As an exclusive service, we design stamps and other postage stamps that represent the culture, history, and biodiversity of Equatorial Guinea.
services.service5feature4: Issuance of stamps with advanced security technology
services.service5benefits: Our stamps are true works of art that promote national identity and become collector's items. Each issue tells a story and celebrates our country's most important milestones.
services.service6modalDesc: We distribute stamps for philately and other philatelic products for collectors and postal history enthusiasts.
services.service6benefits: We offer philatelists exclusive products documenting the history and culture of Equatorial Guinea. Our limited editions are prized by collectors around the world.
services.service7modalDesc: We issue and distribute commemorative coins for numismatic purposes that celebrate historical events and prominent figures of Equatorial Guinea.
services.service7feature2: Thematic series on history and culture
services.service7feature3: Coinage in precious and non-precious metals
services.service7benefits: Our commemorative coins are pieces of historical and artistic value that preserve national memory. They are excellent numismatic investments and gifts of high symbolic value.
services.service8modalDesc: We offer a variety of activities related to the postal and telecommunications services assigned to us, adapting to the country's changing needs.
services.service8benefits: We continue to innovate to offer comprehensive solutions that meet our customers' emerging needs. Our flexibility and adaptability allow us to remain at the forefront of postal and telecommunications services.

sobreNosotros.h1: Connecting Equatorial Guinea to the world
sobreNosotros.p: GECOTEL, the public company responsible for postal services in Equatorial Guinea, has been offering reliable and efficient solutions since 1992.
sobreNosotros.p1: 25 years of excellence in postal services and connecting Equatorial Guinea
sobreNosotros.p2: GECOTEL was founded as the Post and Telecommunications Company of Equatorial Guinea, with its headquarters located on Rey Boncoro Street, Bioko Norte.
sobreNosotros.parafoexpension: We began our expansion throughout the country, establishing offices in major cities to better serve the population.
sobreNosotros.paraforeconocimiento: Admitted as full members of the Universal Postal Union, we connect with postal services in more than 190 countries.
sobreNosotros.paraexcelencia: For more than 25 years, GECOTEL has been a cornerstone of Equatorial Guinea's postal system. We started with a small team of 20 employees and today we have more than 150 dedicated professionals.
sobreNosotros.paraexcelencia1: Our evolution from a traditional postal service to a comprehensive logistics solutions provider reflects our commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction.
sobreNosotros.principios: The fundamental principles that guide our daily work
sobreNosotros.proporcionar: To provide our customers with quality products, prioritizing efficiency, diligence, and excellent customer service, meeting the highest quality standards for our products.
sobreNosotros.paravision: To be the leading entity in Equatorial Guinea in the postal sector, both in the supply and provision of national and international postal services.
sobreNosotros.paraelegir: Reasons why thousands of customers trust our services
sobreNosotros.implementamos: We implement advanced security protocols to protect each shipment with real-time tracking.
sobreNosotros.optimizamos: We optimize our logistics routes to ensure on-time deliveries throughout the country.
sobreNosotros.ofrecemos: We offer affordable rates without compromising quality, with special discounts for businesses.
sobreNosotros.oficinas: 35 offices and more than 100 service points throughout Equatorial Guinea for your convenience.
sobreNosotros.atencion: Dedicated customer service to address your needs through multiple channels.
sobreNosotros.servpostales: Postal services to more than 190 countries with comprehensive tracking and simplified customs.
sobreNosotros.cabeceras: District capitals at the national level
sobreNosotros.profesionales: Professionals committed to excellence in postal service
sobreNosotros.experiencia1: Engineer with 15 years of experience in logistics and postal network optimization.
sobreNosotros.experto: Expert in international relations and strategic alliances with 12 years of experience in the sector.
sobreNosotros.especialista: Specialist in organizational development management with a focus on corporate culture.
sobreNosotros.estratega: Brand strategist with experience in digital transformation and customer experience.

contacto.paraf: We are here to answer all your questions and provide you with the best service.

prohibido.domesticos1: Some household products are banned because they contain aerosols, flammable paints, or dangerous adhesives.
prohibido.deportivos1: Those containing compressed gases or ammunition are prohibited.
prohibido.camping1: They are prohibited if they contain compressed gas, matches or flammable fuels.
prohibido.prohibidoslist3: Lighters, matches, charcoal, lighter fluid, small generators, propane tanks
prohibido.buceo1: Those that include gas or compressed air tanks are prohibited.
prohibido.cosmeticosymedi1: Some contain alcohol, are packed in dry ice, or are flammable.
prohibido.prohibidoslist5: Narcotics and psychotropic substances or other illicit drugs prohibited in the country of destination, nail polish, lacquer, nail gel, perfumes, aftershave lotions
prohibido.dispositivos1: They may contain flammable liquids, additives or mercury.
prohibido.prohibidoslist6: electric wheelchairs, blood pressure measuring devices or thermometers containing mercury.
prohibido.valores1: Valuables are prohibited due to the risk of theft, and loose batteries are prohibited due to the risk of fire.
prohibido.permitidoslist7: Devices with installed batteries (phones, tablets, etc.), declared bearer values.
prohibido.prohibidoslist7: Wet or lithium batteries, uninstalled batteries, computers with external batteries, batteries that exceed the size/power limit, coins, gold, checks, jewelry
prohibido.gaseslist: Propane tanks, Butane gas, Fire extinguishers, aerosols
prohibido.toxicaslist: Pesticides, agricultural chemicals, mercury compounds, bacteria, viruses, pesticides, poisons
prohibido.radiactivoslist: Radioactive waste, radioactive sources, smoke detectors, uranium.

policy.title: GECOTEL Policies and Terms
policy.description: Learn about our privacy policies, terms of use, and return conditions
policy.privacyIntro: At GECOTEL Equatorial Guinea, we value and respect your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
policy.infoCollectionDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us when:
policy.infoCollection1: You register for an account on our website or app
policy.infoCollection2: You request our logistics and transportation services
policy.infoCollection3: You make a purchase in our store
policy.infoCollection5: You participate in surveys or promotions
policy.infoUsageDesc: We use the collected information to:
policy.infoUsage3: Communicate with you about your shipments
policy.infoUsage5: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
policy.infoSharingDesc: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with:
policy.infoSharing1: Service providers who assist us in our operations
policy.infoSharing3: Third parties in the event of a merger or acquisition of the company
policy.dataSecurityDesc: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
policy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
policy.rights4: Object to the processing of your data
policy.privacyChanges: We reserve the right to update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes.
policy.termsIntro: By using GECOTEL Equatorial Guinea services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
policy.servicesDesc: GECOTEL provides logistics, freight transport, and e-commerce solutions in Equatorial Guinea.
policy.userAccount1: You must be 18 or older to create an account
policy.userAccount2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials
policy.userAccount3: You must provide accurate and up-to-date information
policy.shippingTerms1: Delivery times are estimated and may vary
policy.shippingTerms2: You must provide a complete and accurate delivery address
policy.shippingTerms3: The recipient must be available to receive the package
policy.shippingTerms4: Customs fees and taxes are the recipient's responsibility
policy.paymentsDesc: We accept various payment methods, including:
policy.liabilityDesc: GECOTEL will not be responsible for:
policy.liability1: Delays caused by events beyond our control
policy.liability3: Losses resulting from incorrect shipping information
policy.termsChanges: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
policy.refundsIntro: At GECOTEL, we are committed to resolving any issues with your shipments fairly and efficiently.
policy.returnPolicy1: Products purchased from our store may be returned within 14 days of receipt
policy.returnPolicy2: Products must be in their original condition, unused, and with the original packaging
policy.returnPolicy3: Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility
policy.returnPolicy4: The refund will be processed once the product
policy.claimsProcessDesc: If you have any problems with a shipment:
policy.claimsProcess1: Contact our customer service within 48 hours of delivery
policy.claimsProcess2: Provide the tracking number and details of the problem
policy.claimsProcess3: If necessary, complete the claim form
policy.claimsProcess4: Our team will investigate the case within 5 business days
policy.claimsProcess5: We will notify you of the outcome and the actions to be taken
policy.compensation1: For lost shipments: full refund or reshipment of the package
policy.compensation2: For damaged shipments: compensation based on the declared value
policy.compensation3: For significant delays: discount on your next shipment
policy.exclusions2: Losses due to incorrect address information
policy.exclusions3: Damage to fragile items without special packaging
policy.contactDesc: Our support team is available to help you.

faq.subtitle: Quick Answers
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our logistics and transportation services
faq.q1: How can I send a package?
faq.a1p1: Sending a package with GECOTEL is simple. Follow these steps:
faq.a1li1: Pack your item securely in a sturdy box
faq.a1li2: Visit any of our offices or request a home pickup
faq.a1li3: Provide the recipient's information (full name, address, APV (virtual post office box), and phone number)
faq.a1li4: Select the shipping service that best suits your needs
faq.a1li5: Make the payment and receive your tracking code
faq.a1p2: You can also create a shipment from our online platform and receive our courier with the package ready.
faq.a2p1: Yes, we offer home pickup service throughout Equatorial Guinea. To schedule a pickup:
faq.a2li2: Schedule through our website or mobile app
faq.a2p2: Pickups are made Monday through Saturday from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. You must have the package ready with the recipient's full address.
faq.q3: How long does a delivery take?
faq.a3p1: Delivery time depends on the service selected and the destination:
faq.a3p2: Times may vary depending on factors such as weather conditions, customs, or unforeseen events. You can always track your shipment in real time through our website.
faq.q4: What items are prohibited from shipping?
faq.a4p1: For security reasons, we do not accept the following items:
faq.a4p2: For international shipments, please check the specific restrictions of the destination country. Failure to comply with these policies may result in the retention or destruction of the package and possible legal action.
faq.q5: What should I do if a shipment is lost?
faq.a5p1: At GECOTEL, we take the security of your shipments very seriously. If you think your package has been lost:
faq.a5li1: Check the status of your shipment with your tracking code
faq.a5li2: If the estimated delivery time has passed, contact our customer service
faq.a5li3: Provide your tracking number and shipment details
faq.a5li4: We have initiated an internal investigation that may take up to business days
faq.a5li5: We will keep you informed throughout the process
faq.a5p2: If we confirm the loss of the package, we will proceed with compensation according to our terms and conditions. All our shipments are insured against loss or damage.
faq.a6p1: We accept various payment methods for your convenience:
faq.a6p2: For corporate clients, we offer credit payment options with pre-approval. All prices include VAT and are displayed before confirming shipping.
faq.supportText: Our support team is available to help you with any additional questions you may have.
